metadataAttributes.Title: First Principles of Computer Vision Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Master the First Principles of Computer Vision. Advance the mathematical and physical algorithms empowering computer vision
metadataAttributes.Skills: perception, features and boundaries, Object Recognition, Camera and imaging, 3d reconstruction, Fourier Transform, High-Dynamic-Range (HDR) Imaging, Image Formation, Convolution and Deconvolution, Working Principles of a Camera, Scale Space, Active Contours,
